problem_text_cn: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,已知AB=CD,M、N、P分别是AD、BC、BD的中点∠ABD=20°,∠BDC=70°,则∠NMP的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, it is known that AB = CD, M, N, and P are the midvertices of AD, BC, and BD respectively ∠ABD = N_0, ∠BDC = N_1, then the degree of ∠NMP is ()
raw_answer: 在四边形ABCD中,∵M、N、P分别是AD、BC、BD的中点,∴PN,PM分别是△CDB与△DAB的中位线,∴PM=\frac{2}{z}AB,PN=\frac{1}{2}DC,PM∥AB,PN∥DC.∵AB=CD,∴PM=PN,∴△PMN是等腰三角形,∴∠PMN=∠PNM.∵PM∥AB,PN∥DC,∴∠MPD=∠ABD=20°,∠BPN=∠BDC=70°,∴∠MPN=∠MPD+∠NPD=20°+(180-70)°=130°,∴∠PMN=\frac{180^{°}-120^{°}}{2}=25^{°}.故选B
raw_comment: 本题考查了三角形中位线定理及等腰三角形的判定和性质,解题时要善于根据已知信息,确定应用的知识,
